value.name: After George Floyd, other families demand justice after police killings
value.description: In the year since George Floyd was murdered, police officers have killed hundreds of Americans. The families of the deceased said they want justice.

value.name: Orlando community gathers to reflect one year after George Floyd’s death
value.description: George Floyd was murdered by a Minneapolis police officer, Orlando residents came together to honor Floyd’s life and reflect on the fight for police accountability and racial justice over the past year.
